import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { defaultTheme } from './index';
import rgbThemes from './data';
import { PlaygroundTheme } from './theme.composition';

### Install

```js
// with npm
npm i @partnerhero/phds.utilities.theme

// with yarn
yarn add @partnerhero/phds.utilities.theme
```

### Import Theme

```js
import {
    defaultTheme
    Colors,
} from '@partnerhero/phds.utilities.theme';
```

### Theme Types

On the Compositions section, it is possible to check the color and its RGB value associated with each of the theme types displayed below.

```js

    | 'defaultColor'
    | 'black'
    | 'darkGrey'
    | 'lightGrey'
    | 'lighterGrey'
    | 'lightestGrey'
    | 'white'
    | 'primaryDarkest'
    | 'primaryDarker'
    | 'primary'
    | 'primaryLighter'
    | 'primaryLightest'
    | 'primaryBackground'
    | 'secondaryDarkest'
    | 'secondaryDarker'
    | 'secondary'
    | 'secondaryLighter'
    | 'secondaryLightest'
    | 'secondaryBackground'
    | 'successDarkest'
    | 'successDarker'
    | 'success'
    | 'successLighter'
    | 'successLightest'
    | 'noticeDarkest'
    | 'noticeDarker'
    | 'notice'
    | 'noticeLighter'
    | 'noticeLightest'
    | 'errorDarkest'
    | 'errorDarker'
    | 'error'
    | 'errorLighter'
    | 'errorLightest';

```

### Live Example

Modify the prop themeColor with any of the theme types displayed on the Theme Types section above to see it update live

```js live
<PlaygroundTheme themeColor="primary" />
```

### Full Usage Example

```js
// install styled-components in your project
// npm i styled-components
// import styled and ThemeProvider from styled-components
import styled, { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
// import theme
import { defaultTheme, Colors } from '@partnerhero/phds.utilities.theme';

// create a styled-component
interface BasicProps {
    // All the color themes should be passed as a string.
    // The available theme types are displayed in a section Theme Types above.
    color: ThemeTypes;
}

const ColorfulParagraph =
    styled.p <
    BasicProps >
    `
    color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors[props.color]};
    background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.lighterGrey};
`;

// wrap the styled components with the ThemeProvider
// pass the color prop
export const App = ({ color = 'error' }: BasicProps) => (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
        <ColorfulParagraph color={color}>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
        </ColorfulParagraph>
        <ColorfulParagraph color="primary">
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
        </ColorfulParagraph>
    </ThemeProvider>
);
```
